statements: SELECT * FROM material_deliveries
SELECT material_name, delivery_date FROM material_deliveries
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM material_deliveries
SELECT delivery_id, quantity, material_name FROM material_deliveries
SELECT * FROM material_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT * FROM material_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, quantity ASC, supplier_name
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM material_deliveries WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, delivery_date ASC
SELECT delivery_id, material_name FROM material_deliveries WHERE material_name LIKE '%wood%' OR material_name LIKE '%metal%' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT delivery_id, supplier_name, quantity FROM material_deliveries WHERE supplier_name IN ('Supplier A', 'Supplier B', 'Supplier C') ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, delivery_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM material_deliveries WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT * FROM deliveries;
SELECT material_name, delivery_date FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, delivery_quantity FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_quantity > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM deliveries;
SELECT delivery_id, material_name, delivery_date FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_quantity > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT material_name, delivery_date FROM deliveries WHERE material_name = 'Steel' AND delivery_quantity >= 50
SELECT delivery_id, material_name, delivery_quantity FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT material_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_quantity FROM deliveries WHERE material_name LIKE '%Plastic%'
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels
SELECT delivery_id, material_name, quantity FROM material_deliveries
SELECT delivery_id, material_name, delivery_date FROM material_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date FROM delivery_history WHERE status = 'Delivered'
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT delivery_id, material_name, delivery_date, quantity FROM material_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(delivery_id) as delivery_count FROM delivery_history GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM material_deliveries WHERE material_name = 'wood' AND quantity > 50 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, supplier_name, status FROM delivery_history ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM material_deliveries;
SELECT material_name, delivery_quantity FROM material_deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, SUM(delivery_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM delivery_history GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM material_deliveries WHERE delivery_quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, delivery_date FROM material_deliveries WHERE delivery_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT material_name, current_quantity, reorder_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < reorder_level ORDER BY material_name ASC;

SELECT d.delivery_id, s.supplier_name, d.delivery_date, d.material_name, d.delivery_quantity FROM delivery_history d INNER JOIN suppliers s ON d.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE d.delivery_quantity > 200 ORDER BY d.delivery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_deliveries;
SELECT delivery_id, material_name, quantity FROM material_deliveries WHERE material_name = 'Wood';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT available_quantity, material_name FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_history WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_deliveries WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM material_deliveries GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM material_prices ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM delivery_history WHERE status = 'Delivered' AND delivery_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
